Key Match Events: David Brooks scored the opening goal for Wales in the 3rd minute.
Neco Williams scored the second goal for Wales in the 38th minute.
Teemu Pukki scored for Finland in the 45th minute.
Brennan Johnson scored the third goal for Wales in the 47th minute.
Dan James scored the fourth goal for Wales in the 87th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Rob Page emphasized the importance of bringing their A-game and maintaining their values to achieve success.
Finland coach Markku Kanerva acknowledged Wales' strong performance in the campaign, highlighting their victory over Croatia.
Teemu Pukki remains Finland's main marksman at the age of 33, now playing for Minnesota United in Major League Soccer.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales beat Finland 4-1 in the Euro 2024 play-off semi-finals.
Wales will face Poland in the play-off final for a spot in the Euros.
